events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving the incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in refunds for further handling.
Hello, thanks for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to start the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 789456123, and I have attached a photo showing the wrong item I received instead.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and arrange a pickup for the incorrect item within two business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prompt refund and pickup arrangement.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and the pickup was scheduled. Please check your account for the refund confirmation.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As you have confirmed receipt of the refund, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
